name: Meridian Bank
description: Meridian Bank is a community-focused financial institution dedicated to providing personalized banking solutions to individuals and businesses. Established in 2004, the bank has built a reputation for its commitment to exceptional customer service and innovative financial products. Meridian Bank offers a wide range of services including personal banking, business banking, commercial lending, and wealth management. With an emphasis on technology, the bank provides its customers with convenient online and mobile banking options, ensuring they have access to their accounts anytime, anywhere. Meridian Bank's mission is to create lasting relationships with its clients while contributing positively to the communities it serves. The bank actively participates in various local initiatives and charitable organizations, reinforcing its commitment to community development and financial literacy. As a member of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), Meridian Bank ensures the safety and security of its clients' deposits while striving to be a trusted partner in their financial journeys.

seo.meta_description: Explore Meridian Bank, a community-focused financial institution offering personalized banking solutions for individuals and businesses. Discover our commitment to exceptional service.

faq.question: What services does Meridian Bank offer?
faq.answer: Meridian Bank offers personal banking, business banking, commercial lending, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Meridian Bank?
faq.answer: Jay G. Wiggins is the CEO of Meridian Bank.

faq.question: Where is Meridian Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Meridian Bank is headquartered in Kirkland, Washington, USA.

faq.question: Does Meridian Bank offer online banking?
faq.answer: Yes, Meridian Bank provides convenient online and mobile banking options for its customers.
